section.p: Cross off the 200 Shards from your Adventure Sheet. Blue Cap snorts with satisfaction and lumbers off into the dark.

You press on down the tunnel. After a while, you come to a large round chamber of dressed stone, hung with banners. Flat, stone slabs are arranged around its edge. Upon them rest warriors in golden armour. They clasp long, two-handed swords in their gauntleted hands. They appear to be asleep. .
